H0.text: In which country was kung fu expert Bruce Lee born. China

H1.text: In which country was kung fu expert Bruce Lee born. Hong Kong

H2.text: In which country was kung fu expert Bruce Lee born. Taiwan

H3.text: In which country was kung fu expert Bruce Lee born. US

A4.text: Bruce Lee was born in San Francisco, California, United States.

A5.text: His birth in the U.S. allowed him to claim U.S. citizenship due to the United States' jus soli citizenship laws.
